title: New Rune Questions
body:
I have some questions about the specifics of some new runes!

1: How does the Arcane Comet rune interact with displacement abilities. For example, if I take this on blitzcrank, will it be thrown to where they were, or will it land on me because that's obviously where they will be?

2: Does Aerie shield you if you apply a shield to yourself? 

3: How will Aerie interact with Soraka, since she can heal everyone at the same instant. Does Aerie have a maximum range?

4: Electrocute deals adaptive damage, it says. Does that mean it can deal physical damage, and thus interact with Zed ult?

5: Does Approach Velocity (inspiration tree) work on slows, or just hard CC? I hope it works on slows, otherwise it would be very niche.

6: Does Bard's Tunnel proc Sudden Impact for anyone who uses it?

7: Dark Harvest causes souls collected to deal bonus damage on your next (basic attack?) within 20 seconds. Does collecting souls refresh the 20 seconds, or is it like if you collected 1 soul 19 seconds ago and get 1 more soul, the other one like decays away and you still only have the 1 new one?

replies.body: Thank you!!! That makes so much more sense!

>3: How will Aerie interact with Soraka, since she can heal everyone at the same instant. Does Aerie have a maximum range?

It won't.  Aerie's allied interaction only works off of shielding.  So if you are Janna, Lulu, Karma, Morg, ect you can use it.

Although the tool tip is certainly not clear on this, the spirit can proc off any ally-Targeting spell or an enemy-Damaging spell. For example zillean's E can proc it on allies, but only his Q can proc it on enemies
I've tested it though, it doesn't work on half of what you might think.
very nice thinking, the most interestings one I see there is the blitz question soraka and souls, I hope they clarify this soon
